system.description: You are known for doing the unexpected and people love to hear about it. Whenever you arrive in a settlement you are visited by 1d4+1 bards, scholars, and sages asking for recountings of your recent exploits. In exchange they reach either share a piece of information they think might be relevant to your current quest, or make an Intelligence,  Wisdom, or Charisma check (bonus of +5) on your behalf to answer a specific question.
